Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.chat.messagebuilder

Class MessageBuilder

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.chat.messagebuilder.MessageBuilder
public class MessageBuilder extends Object
A ComponentBuilder wrapper with custom methods and color codes support.

Big Note!

This builder default to ComponentBuilder.append(String, ComponentBuilder.FormatRetention) with a ComponentBuilder.FormatRetention.NONE retention, meaning using append(String) will not carry any formatting nor events.

    • eventShowText

      public MessageBuilder eventShowText(@Nonnull String... values)
      Adds a HoverEvent with a HoverEvent.Action.SHOW_TEXT action.
      Parameters:
      values - - Values to show; each line will be treated as a new line.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if values are null or empty.

    • eventShowTextBlock

      public MessageBuilder eventShowTextBlock(@Nonnull String textBlock)
      Adds a HoverEvent with a HoverEvent.Action.SHOW_TEXT action. 
       builder.eventShowTextBlock("""
                     This is the first line.

                     &c;;This is a red text that will be wrapped after a given number of chars.


                     Another line!
                     """);
      will be formatted as such: 
        This is the first line.

  &cThis is a red text that will be wrapped
  &cafter a given number of chars.


  Another line!
      Parameters:
      textBlock - - Text block to add, each new line will be treated as a new line.

    • eventShowTextBlock

      public MessageBuilder eventShowTextBlock(@Nonnull String textBlock, int limit)
      Adds a HoverEvent with a HoverEvent.Action.SHOW_TEXT action with a custom character limit.
      Parameters:
      textBlock - - Text block.
      limit - - Character limit.

      the built message.
